Detailed Description

This class holds the properties of a lens effect, and performs tick/draw logic.

void LensEffect::added ( uint32  when  ) 

See also:
added

uint32 LensEffect::added (  )  const

This method gets the counter when this flare was last added.

float LensEffect::age (  )  const

This method gets the age of the visible flare.

If no flare is visible then it returns the age of the youngest flare.

void LensEffect::ageBy ( float  dAge  ) 

This method increases the age of the visible lens flare by the given age.

It also ages the flares that are not currently visible by a rate dependent on their occlusion level and the current visibility.

Parameters:
ageBy How much to age the lens effect by.

void LensEffect::area ( float  a  ) 

This method sets the area of the flare geometry for testing occlusion.

This method returns the area of the flare geometry for testing occlusion.

float LensEffect::distanceToAlpha ( float  dist  )  const

This method returns the brightness of the flare given a distance in metres.

Inverse square falloff.
